text: Table I. Causes of hyperthyroidism in pregnancy’® Category Aetiology PRIVARYTHYROD - Gravesdisease - Acute, subacute or chronic thyroiditis « Toxic adenoma - Toxic multinodular goitre GESTATIONAL - Transient gestational thyrotoxicosis + Multiple gestations « Molar pregnancy « TSH-receptor mutation -« Hyperplacentosis « Hyperreacto luteinalis OTHER - latrogenic « Struma ovarii + TSH-producing pituitary adenoma
